version_description:
1.Fix the bugs
2.Multiple languages support (French, Russian, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese)
1.Fix some users failed to download firmware

1. Fix bugs.
2.Add auto saving of photo quality.
Fixes the recording issue of some mobile devices

1. UI Adjustment.
2. Bugs fixed.
3. Compatible with iPhone X series device.

1. Adds support for the new Tello Talent aircraft.

Use the Tello app to connect your mobile device with the Tello Edu aircraft through its Wi-Fi SSID (Tello-xxxxxx) and then update the aircraft firmware. Currently, the aircraft firmware cannot be updated using the Wi-Fi SSID (RMTT-xxxxxx) of Tello Talent.

Updating Aircraft Firmware:
1) Connect your mobile device to the internet and open the Tello app. When a window is displayed indicating a new firmware version has been detected, tap Download. Alternatively, tap Settings > More > … > Firmware Version > Update to get the latest firmware.
2) Connect your mobile device with Tello Edu. If a window is displayed indicating a new firmware version has been detected, tap it and then tap Update. Wait until the firmware update is complete and then restart the aircraft.

Updating the Open-Source Controller:
1) Download and install the DJI Education Platform at www.edu.dji.com/download.
2) Launch RoboMaster Assistant.
3) Connect the open-source controller to the computer using a micro USB cable. Follow the instructions to update the firmware.

What’s New?
- Adds compatibility with iOS 14.
- Adds activation for the extention module.
- Optimizes the update function.
- Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.
